response.original_title: KALT Gamimg Team - House Flipper Pt. 3: Bir Oyun Potporisi
response.overview: Those who are sitting at home want to go out, those who are outside want to go home. Those who are with people want to be alone, and those who are alone want people. This chain of contradictions can even reach the point where someone with a candy bar says, "I wish I had plain chocolate, I could eat plain chocolate." Most human desires should be ignored, dismissed with a "Okay, we'll see." Because human beings are spoiled. They were born spoiled, grew up spoiled, and will die spoiled........
response.title: KALT Gamimg Team - House Flipper Pt. 3: Bir Oyun Potporisi
